Posts.Content: bt55 wrote: Few days ago my mum has been diagnosed with Breast Cancer, the doctors say its "undifferentiated carcinoma of the breast" and he says its an aggressive cancer. Would somebody please tell me in a simplified way, what "undifferentiated carcinoma" means? What stage of cancer would that be placed in? is it something serious? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: undifferentiated carcinoma bt55 MarieKelly

Posts.Content: May 27, 2008 08:40AM bt55 wrote: Thank you guys so much for your comments and support! My mum has just been diagnosed a few days ago and it has come with a complete shock to our family. I know very little about any kind of cancer and so im trying to get as much information as i can so that we can give my mum the right treatment. She had a tumor which was infected, but that has been removed and from what we know so far no other part of the body is infected, so the doctors suggest she will require chemo, but we will only know more about the plan of attack after she visits the Oncologist. As for now she is recovering from her surgery.  I shall be visiting the site frequently as she will be going through her treatment. again thank you all so much....
Posts.Title: undifferentiated carcinoma bt55 MarieKelly
